alert.note: Alert for Greer; Harmon (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 10 at 5:19PM CDT until April 10 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Harmon County in southwestern Oklahoma... Central Greer County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 519 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of Willow, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Harmon and central Greer Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
